page.title: 19Children's Games
page.content: Playground Games - Mainly games where one person is chosen to be on and he has to chase and catch the other people. Ball games - donkey, Queenie, queenie whose got the ball. Football in the field, skipping elastic and ropes still popular. Army, knight rider, make believe action games also mentioned. Games played at Home - Hide and seek, skipping, hopscotch, lurky, football, cricket, bikes, rounders all quite popular. Inside games - computer games mentioned the most. Board games included Monopoly, Scrabble, Connect 4. Other inside games include Subbuteo, Lego, dominoes, darts, snooker, football and electronic games.
